Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: prevent black flashing during rapid reframing

Fixes blacking issue when window rapidly resizes by preventing cleared
rendering canvases from being shown before new pixels arrive. During
rapid reframes \(e.g., mobile scrolling\), the canvas size changes faster
than the worker can provide new pixels, causing black flashes.

Changes:
- Guard WebGL/WebGPU canvas visibility with dimension mismatch check
- Skip canvas pixel recovery when awaiting reframe pixels
- Keep freeze frame visible until matching pixels are received

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
